title: LF Bronze/Silver Support
body:
ADC looking for Support looking for someone to grind through the lower ELOs to escape the dankness of Bronze.

I play mainly Jinx & Ashe, but can play other ADC champs as well.

Add me in game and tell me who you main - SteaksauceX

replies.body:
you dont "grind through lower elo"

what kind of person "Grinds through lower elo?"

take drugs do exercise eat a better diet watch replays do new things hang out with different people, go see a life coach

grind through lower elo...

[spoiler]MFW[/spoiler]
Anyone in Bronze that wants to get out 'grinds' through.. cause that's what it is.  A shit fest.
Add me i main thresh when i sup and i can play blitz or morg
Yeah man, Add me Ill play
